defaultItem.title: TinaCMS by the numbers
defaultItem.description: TinaCMS is an open-source content management system that allows developers to create and manage content for their websites and applications. It provides a flexible and customizable framework for building content-driven applications.

defaultItem.title: Start Building
defaultItem.description: Get started with TinaCMS today and take your content management to the next level.

defaultItem.title: Build job ready skills in software development
defaultItem.description: Learn the essential technologies that power professional software engineering. Transform raw potential into industry-ready expertise.

skills.title: .NET development fundamentals
skills.text: Learn to build robust enterprise applications using the powerful and versatile .NET framework.

skills.title: Angular framework mastery
skills.text: Create dynamic, responsive web applications with advanced Angular techniques and best practices.

skills.title: Database design and management
skills.text: Develop advanced skills in Entity Framework Core and SQL Server for efficient data handling.

skills.title: Agile project workflows
skills.text: Implement Scrum methodologies to streamline development processes and enhance collaboration and productivity.

tabs.title: Why this course
tabs.headline: Build intelligent systems that solve real-world problems
tabs.content: Learn to design robust technical frameworks that solve real-world problems. Develop strategic thinking beyond basic programming skills.

tabs.title: What to expect
tabs.headline: Intensive hands-on training with real projects
tabs.content: Experience 12 weeks of immersive learning with practical exercises and real client projects.

tabs.title: Prerequisites
tabs.headline: Basic programming knowledge recommended
tabs.content: While we accept learners from diverse backgrounds, basic understanding of programming concepts will help you succeed.

defaultItem.title: Get certified as an SSW Qualified Developer
defaultItem.description:
After completing FireBootCamp, you will earn a certification as an SSW Qualified Developer!
Which can be validated, recognised and shared on social media platforms.
defaultItem.disclaimer: By submitting, you're committing to a breakthrough in your software development career.

defaultItem.title: FAQs
defaultItem.description: Get answers to the most common questions about our intensive developer training program.

faqs.question: What technologies will I learn?
faqs.answer: You'll master .NET, Angular, Entity Framework Core, and SQL Server. Our curriculum covers modern full-stack development technologies used by top tech companies.

faqs.question: Do I need prior coding experience?
faqs.answer: Basic programming knowledge is helpful but not required. We accept motivated learners with varying technical backgrounds through our entry assessment.

faqs.question: What is the scholarship process?
faqs.answer: Candidates must pass an entry test to qualify for the discounted $9,000 rate. Limited spots are available each cohort.

faqs.question: Is online learning an option?
faqs.answer: Our program is currently in-person to ensure maximum interaction and hands-on learning. Future online options are being developed.

defaultItem.title: Your code. Your future. Now.
defaultItem.description: Take the first step towards a transformative developer career
defaultItem.disclaimer: By submitting, you commit to becoming a professional software developer
